name: Marble Race (itch) (Gold356, DarkZ)
description:
Controls

  • Move with the arrow keys
  • R to restart the race
  • esc to go to the main menu

Marble Race is a racing game about little balls that have to reach the first place in a circuit with lots of obstacles.

Listen to the OST here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0gtpD2LYtAo&list=PLRpmn0bNA-ghOdOqjPKEjOHtfNhCcatLX
